name: Elena Zacharenko
goal: Helping NGO and institutional clients get messages across to EU decision makers - be it on EU internal affairs, or its human rights, foreign or development policy.
interests: Borders and Security, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: I follow the work of the AFET, DROI, DEVCO, FEMM and LIBE committees.
